DOC.brief_summary: The cardiorespiratory training can increase muscle strength ventilatory.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiorespiratory Training and Ventilatory Muscle Strength
DOC.detailed_description: Specifically for being an experiment parallel factorial intervention after met the eligibility criteria for the participants will be randomly allocated to three groups: control, respiratory training, cardiorespiratory training (indoor Bike).
DOC.criteria: Have lower maximal inspiratory pressure (MIP) and maximal expiratory pressure (MEP) values normative reference proposed by the Brazilian Society of Thoracic. Not be voluntary to the present study. Conditions that oblige participants are absent for more than two weeks of activities performed in the experiment.
